articles.author: TOI Lifestyle Desk
articles.title: Walking for less than an hour, thrice a week can have this profound impact on brain - Times of India
articles.description: As per a study, physical activity like walking can increase the brain size. And for this you don't have to walk for hours everyday, just 40 minutes of walk only three times a week is enough to improve cognitive ability. Sounds fascinating right! The findings …
articles.content: Factors like chronic stress, poor sleep, sedentary lifestyle, and lack of mental stimulation can accelerate this process. However, regular exercise, especially aerobic activity, along with a healthy … [+460 chars]
